鞍前馬後.definition: to follow everywhere; to always be there for sb at their beck and call

鞍山市.definition: Anshan, prefecture-level city in Liaoning Province 遼寧省|辽宁省[Liao2ning2 Sheng3]

鞍韂.definition: a saddle with a saddle blanket

鞍韉.definition: (literary) a saddle with a saddle blanket

鞍點.definition: saddle point (math.), a critical point of a function of several variables that is neither a maximum nor a minimum
